actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to authorize a grant program for research and development of guidelines to conserve energy by reducing air drag on trucks.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to such persons as he determines are qualified to carry out research and development for the reduction of air drag on trucks using the Federal-aid systems. Requires the Secretary to report to Congress, from time to time, on progress and findings with respect to the research and development carried out under this Act. Authorizes to be appropriated, out of the Highway Trust Fund, not to exceed $2,000,000 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to authorize a grant program for research and development of guidelines to conserve energy by reducing air drag on trucks.
